attributes.title: Cheating
attributes.review: This is the worst app in all of history. Its totally lying and manipulative towards me and I’ve had it. Take down this app NOW

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: after i downloaded this, my phone burst into flames. i had to go buy a new one. very scary. this app should not exist

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP‼️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it gave me diarrhea. Every time I go on the app it shows a fat crusty orange. Now i’m traumatized, I CAN NOT SLEEP AT NIGHT. I have to keep an eye out for the fat crusty orange 👁👄 —

attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️Absolute worst✨
attributes.review: This app was so glitchy and was so annoying. I hope no one ever downloads this app!!!

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app so I could look into stuff more open my eyes, but then I click off of the app and I see OUR PRESIDENT  naked!!!! 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮 AS MYY WALLPAPER! THIS APP ALSO CAN TRACK YOUR LOCATION WHILE NOTT USING IT! 🤮🤢🤮🤮🤢🤮 THIS APP SHOULD BE BANNED!!

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.userName: Fun but flappy bird is better

attributes.review: i would give this a zero star if i could bc i downloaded it and my house got haunted by it and my phone broke because of it im writing this review from my ipod touch i had when i was like 10 dont download this unless you want your house to be haunted 😹😹😹🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮💅💅
